subject: Re: JUnit compatibility (was: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit 4.12-beta-1 is released)
msgSnippet: Hi all, any progress on a 4.12 release? I d like to upgrade the lib version we re using and prefer to go to 4.12 if it is in the pipe soon. Otherwise, I ll
messageBody:
Hi all,


any progress on a 4.12 release? I'd like to upgrade the lib version we're using and prefer to go to 4.12 if it is in the pipe soon. Otherwise, I'll have to settle for 4.11. A time indication of "soon" or "far away" would be sufficient :)


BR,
Chris
